There's nothing quite like a cold drink after a hard day of labor.$h"/pause 800/speak Lyell "I don't think I'll ever grow sick of a nice drink if I'm being honest.$h"/emote Lyell 32/pause 800/speak Lyell "Think I've been around long enough to get tired of it too.$h"/emote farmer 8/pause 800/speak Lyell "Hm? I'd just make my own stuff and drink that.$h"/pause 800/speak Lyell "As much as I believe in following the law, some of them are just too silly to take seriously.$h"/pause 800/speak Lyell "I was much worse as a young man, though.
